template.name: Шаблон CGP SNMP
template.description:
Версия 1.3 - (20170015) Автор: Дмитрий Малинин Все вопросы и пожелания на dmitry@malinin.com
Статистика CGP (встроенные метрики) Макрос {$SNMP_COMMUNITY} добавляется в каждый хост

item.name: httpUserActive
item.description: number of active HTTP User connections

item.name: httpUserAuthFailed
item.description: total number of failed HTTP User Authentication requests

item.name: httpUserAuthSucceeded
item.description: total number of successful HTTP User Authentication requests

item.name: httpUserCGIRequestsProcessed
item.description: total number of User CGI requests processed

item.name: httpUserJobs
item.description: total number of HTTP User connections processed

item.name: httpUserNotFound
item.description: total number of HTTP User not-found errors

item.name: httpUserRequestsProcessed
item.description: total number of HTTP User requests processed

item.name: httpUserTotal
item.description: total number of HTTP User channels

item.name: imapInputActive
item.description: number of active IMAP input connections

item.name: imapInputJobs
item.description: total number of IMAP input connections processed

item.name: imapInputTotal
item.description: total number of IMAP input channels

item.name: imapTotalAttributeUpdates
item.description: total number of message attribute updates

item.name: imapTotalSelectedMailboxes
item.description: total number of mailboxes selected or examined

item.name: imapTotalStatusMailboxes
item.description: total number of mailboxes checked with the STATUS command

item.name: imapTotalStoredMessages
item.description: total number of message flags modified with the STORE command

item.name: ldapInputActive
item.description: number of active LDAP input connections

item.name: ldapInputJobs
item.description: total number of LDAP input connections processed

item.name: ldapInputTotal
item.description: total number of LDAP input channels

item.name: numDequeuerActiveProcessors
item.description: current number of active dequeuer processors

item.name: numDequeuerBatches
item.description: current number of unprocessed dequeuer batches

item.name: numEnqueuerActiveProcessors
item.description: current number of active enqueuer processors

item.name: numEnqueuerMessages
item.description: current number of submitted, but not yet enqueued messages

item.name: popInputActive
item.description: number of active POP input connections

item.name: popInputJobs
item.description: total number of POP input connections processed

item.name: popInputTotal
item.description: total number of POP input channels

item.name: popTotalRetrievedBytes
item.description: total number of retrieved message bytes

item.name: popTotalSubmittedMessages
item.description: total number of XTND XMIT-ed messages

item.name: smtpInputActive
item.description: number of active SMTP input connections

item.name: smtpInputJobs
item.description: total number of SMTP input connections processed

item.name: smtpInputRBLFailed
item.description: incoming SMTP: connections blacklisted with RBL

item.name: smtpInputRecipientsAccepted
item.description: incoming SMTP: accepted RCPT TO commands

item.name: smtpInputRecipientsRejected
item.description: incoming SMTP: rejected RCPT TO commands

item.name: smtpInputReturnPathsRejected
item.description: incoming SMTP: rejected MAIL FROM commands

item.name: smtpInputTotal
item.description: total number of SMTP input channels

item.name: smtpOutputActive
item.description: number of active SMTP outgoing connections

item.name: smtpOutputActiveHosts
item.description: number of active SMTP domain queues

item.name: smtpOutputJobs
item.description: total number of SMTP outgoing connections processed

item.name: smtpOutputRecipientsRejected
item.description: outgoing SMTP: rejected RCPT TO commands

item.name: smtpOutputRecipientsSent
item.description: outgoing SMTP: accepted RCPT TO commands

item.name: smtpOutputReturnPathsRejected
item.description: outgoing SMTP: rejected MAIL FROM commands

item.name: smtpOutputTotal
item.description: total number of SMTP outgoing channels

item.name: smtpOutputWaitingHosts
item.description: number of waiting SMTP domain queues

item.name: totalDeletedMessages
item.description: total number of processed (and deleted) messages

item.name: totalMailDeliveryReports
item.description: total number of delivery reports generated

item.name: totalMailErrorReports
item.description: total number of error reports generated

item.name: totalMailWarningReports
item.description: total number of warning reports generated

trigger.name: ActiveThreads - растет количество, через 15 минут превысит значение 6000 на {HOST.NAME}
